headline: Seamlessly connecting healthcare facilities and professionals throughâ¦
description: CareRev is a technology platform empowering healthcare professionals to take control of their careers. CareRev provides a direct line between healthcare facilities and local clinical talent, cutting out the middleman and enabling professionals to work where and when they want. Together, weâre building the local, resilient, flexible healthcare workforce of the future. For more information, visit carerev.com or follow us on LinkedIn.

# We see healthcare differently.
Traditional approaches aren’t enough
** _‍_** Rethink patient care with a more adaptive, responsive, workforce strategy.
[Workforce solutions](https://www.carerev.com/</hospitals>)[Find shifts](https://www.carerev.com/</find-shifts>)
![A nurse uses the CareRev app to find shifts](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/5babc11099f97ef511cf24a6/6495eb2d058e2b1bcd6c315d_carerev-nurse-app.png)
#### Trusted by health systems nationwide

[![A healthcare facility badge that says Facilities.](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/5babc11099f97ef511cf24a6/6495f524af175110d79577ba_facilities-badge.png)](https://www.carerev.com/</hospitals>)[![A healthcare facility badge that says Professionals.](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/5babc11099f97ef511cf24a6/6495f524619c537f4e3c2d70_professionals-badge.png)](https://www.carerev.com/</why-carerev>)
Join
## a revolution in healthcare
CareRev empowers healthcare professionals with the ability to coordinate their work schedules and select shifts with our tech-enabled solutions. Our app provides a direct line of communication between healthcare facilities and flexible clinical talent, enabling professionals to work where and when they want and healthcare facilities to secure staff when and where they need it—all via technology and all in real-time.
[Workforce solutions](https://www.carerev.com/</hospitals>)[Find shifts](https://www.carerev.com/</find-shifts>)
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/5babc11099f97ef511cf24a6/64c2ec0d6829e51196a432b4_platform.svg)
## Unlock a tech-enabled flexible workforce
A holistic approach to meet today’s needs
Scale up and down in line with demand and respond quickly with access to an on-demand, flexible workforce.
[Learn more about our flexible workforce solutions](https://www.carerev.com/</hospitals>)
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/5babc11099f97ef511cf24a6/6499e814ecdc81abc1768315_carerev-marketplace-platform.png)
case study
### Our flexible workforce solutions in action
CareRev’s flexible workforce solutions helped Henry Mayo Newhall increase their fill rate by 57%
[Read the case study ](https://www.carerev.com/<https:/www.carerev.com/resources/henry-mayo-smart-rates-case-study>)
## Think differently about healthcare staffing challenges
[![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/5babc11099f97ea5dbcf24d5/67a2947cbf20b88e9f044c48_nurse-recruitment-webinar.jpg)Watch The Blog: How CNOs are Tackling Nurse Recruitment in 2025](https://www.carerev.com/</blog/watch-the-blog-how-cnos-are-tackling-nurse-recruitment-in-2025>)
[![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/5babc11099f97ea5dbcf24d5/67520508b132427133a8a083_acute-staffing-book.jpg)How IRP+ is Revolutionizing Workforce Management: Insights from CareRev's Product Manager, Brandon Blackman](https://www.carerev.com/</blog/how-irp-plus-is-revolutionizing-workforce-management-insights-from-carerevs-product-manager-brandon-blackman>)
[![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/5babc11099f97ea5dbcf24d5/65b92eee02743b6b920239e4_6596d9b7c582d9fc336910e8_nurse-walks-alone.jpeg)Addressing the Healthcare Workforce Crisis: A Solution for Hospitals](https://www.carerev.com/</blog/addressing-the-healthcare-workforce-crisis-a-solution-for-hospitals>)
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/5babc11099f97ef511cf24a6/64998fa8c5eecec5b3b145e6_pink-carerev-square.png)
## Shifts on your schedule
Connect with healthcare facilities and claim the flexibility you’re looking for.‍For Registered Nurses, Certified Nursing Assistants, LPNs, Techs, and other clinical specialties.
[Learn how CareRev works](https://www.carerev.com/</how-it-works>)[Explore our locations](https://www.carerev.com/</locations>)[Find shifts](https://www.carerev.com/</find-shifts>)
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/5babc11099f97ef511cf24a6/649dd4b49fef83bbffb2a8e1_Mockup-scheduling.png)![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/5babc11099f97ef511cf24a6/65a1748c7f050bc9da4a1635_state-locations-carerev-map.svg)
![A phlebotomist takes blood from a patient in a hospital room.](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/5babc11099f97ef511cf24a6/64e797f0cdba1a0972793166_phlebotomist.jpg)
## We see a brighter future for American healthcare.
They say healthcare facilities are broken, and demand is creating burnout. Providers are overworked and overwhelmed. It’s too costly to staff appropriately, and the need for qualified professionals will continue to outpace supply.‍We see it differently.
[Get our Staffing Technology Guide for Hospitals to learn more](https://www.carerev.com/<https:/facilities.carerev.com/hospitals>)
## Contact us
To request assistance from our Support team, please submit the form and a representative will be in touch within 24 hours.You may also contact us via phone or email:
#### **Support contact info**
Call: (415) 223-9964Email: help@carerev.com
Type of support requested...Shift QuestionCredentialingPayment QuestionProduct QuestionOther

generated_description:
**CareRev: Redefining Healthcare Staffing**

Founded in 2015 and part of Y Combinator's S16 cohort, CareRev operates out of remote Oregon and has grown to a team of 275 employees. Their mission? To seamlessly connect healthcare facilities with professionals, cutting out the middleman and enabling a more flexible workforce. 

CareRev's platform is designed to empower healthcare workers to take control of their careers, allowing them to choose when and where they want to work. This direct interaction not only benefits the professionals but also allows healthcare facilities to quickly secure the staffing they need. 

With a suite of tech-enabled solutions, CareRev offers hospitals and healthcare systems a fresh approach to tackling staffing challenges. Their services include FlexWork, a designed marketplace for facility staff, and Smart Rates, which helps optimize staffing costs. 

The company has already made its mark by improving staffing efficiencies; for instance, they assisted Henry Mayo Newhall in increasing their fill rate by 57%. 

CareRev sees a brighter future for healthcare. They believe in a flexible workforce strategy that responds to the ever-changing demands of the healthcare sector, ensuring professionals are not only utilized efficiently but are also less likely to experience burnout. 

To learn more about CareRev, visit their website at [careRev.com](https://www.carerev.com) or check them out on LinkedIn.
